titleStmt.title: The sea-gunner shewing the practical part of gunnery as it is used at sea : and, as an introduction thereto, there is exhibited two compendiums, one of vulgar, the other of decimal arithmetick, with necessary tables relating to that art : to which is added an appendix, shewing the use of a proportional scale gunnery, and the use off the sea-gunners rule ... / composed by John Seller, Senior.
titleStmt.author: Seller, John, fl. 1658-1698.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by H. Clark ... and are to be sold by him ...,

notesStmt.note: An appendix has a special t.p. and separate paging.
Reproduction of original in British Library.
